content: and using a pick up and knit 27 sts as follows  5 sts along the edge of the top ribbing  17 sts in the colorwork section  5 sts along the edge of the bottom ribbing wash and block lightly sew on buttons and enjoy 2 steek tutorial step #2 attach yarn there are many ways to reinforce a steek so that it is more resistant to unraveling with very grabby yarn you may not need to do anything for very slippery yarn only a machine- sewn reinforcement will do for this project i recommend using a crocheted reinforcement step #1 identify the columns to be worked 123456 turn your work so that the side of the steek you re working on is oriented horizontally and nearest to you put a slip knot on 1 the crochet hook and insert hook through the edge pull a loop through the edge and also through the loop on the hook look at your cozy with the 6-st steek facing you the cutting line runs vertically between sts 3 and 4 sts 1-3 will be the left-hand side of the steek and sts 4-6 will be the right-hand side of the steek to reinforce the left-hand side we will be crocheting the right loop from column 2 together with the left loop from column 3 similarly on the right-hand side we will be crocheting the right loop from column 4 together with the left loop from column 5 3 step #3 crochet loops together rotate the piece 180° and repeat these steps on the other side insert crochet hook under two adjacent loopsof different your finished crocheted steek should look like the picture colors pull a loop through the loops and through the loop on below carefully cut the steek by snipping the horizontal bars the hook repeat this step until all the stitches have been connecting columns 3 and 4 crocheted together cut yarn and pull through the last loop on the hook to secure after cutting
